mapper.select:
SELECT id AS messageId, seq, receiver_id AS recvUserId, -- 接收者 sender_id AS sendUserId, -- 发送者 msg_type AS type, content, read_flag = 1 AS readFlag, -- 转布尔 status, create_time FROM chat_user_history
((sender_id, receiver_id) IN ((#{userId},#{peerId}),(#{peerId},#{userId}))) -- 两人对话 AND (sender_id=#{userId} AND deleted_by_s = 0 OR sender_id=#{peerId} AND deleted_by_r = 0)
AND (create_time < #{cursor} OR (create_time = #{cursor} AND seq < #{cursorSeq}))
ORDER BY create_time DESC,seq DESC LIMIT #{limit};
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO chat_user_history (seq, sender_id, receiver_id, content, msg_type, status, read_flag, deleted_by_s, deleted_by_r, create_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{item.seq}, #{item.sendUserId}, #{item.recvUserId}, #{item.content}, #{item.type}, #{item.status}, 10, 0, 0, -- 初始未删除 #{item.createTime}, NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE content = VALUES(content), status = VALUES(status), read_flag = VALUES(read_flag), update_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT sender_id AS userId, receiver_id AS peerId, LEFT(content,50) AS `snapshot`, create_time AS lastMsgTime, seq AS displaySeq, status FROM chat_user_history WHERE ((sender_id,receiver_id) in ((#{userId},#{peerId}),(#{peerId},#{userId}))) AND (sender_id=#{userId} AND deleted_by_s=0 OR sender_id=#{peerId} AND deleted_by_r=0) ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1
